business-marketing.title: Market Trend Analysis
business-marketing.prompt: Analyze current market trends in [industry] and identify emerging opportunities for growth.

business-marketing.title: Competitive Landscape Comparison
business-marketing.prompt: Compare our organization with top competitors regarding product offerings, customer engagement, and market position.

business-marketing.title: Customer Feedback Insights
business-marketing.prompt: Analyze customer feedback from recent surveys and online reviews to identify key satisfaction drivers and areas for improvement.

business-marketing.title: Innovative Expansion Ideas
business-marketing.prompt: Generate innovative ideas for expanding into new markets, including potential challenges and opportunities.

business-marketing.title: Social Media Content Calendar
business-marketing.prompt: Create a weekly social media calendar for [platform] with content themes like education, inspiration, promotions, or behind-the-scenes.

business-marketing.title: Brand Voice Guide
business-marketing.prompt: Describe our brand voice in three words. Write examples of how our brand communicates in social posts, emails, and blogs.

business-marketing.title: SEO-Optimized Blog Outline
business-marketing.prompt: Generate a blog outline on the benefits of our new service, optimized for SEO and tailored to our target audience with a call to action.

business-marketing.title: Instagram Posting Time & Hashtags
business-marketing.prompt: Suggest optimal times to post for Instagram about the new product we offer and recommend relevant hashtags based on audience engagement patterns.

business-marketing.title: Case Study Framework
business-marketing.prompt: Create a case study outlining how [your company] helped [client] achieve [specific result] through [strategy or service].

business-marketing.title: Blog Post Ideas Generator
business-marketing.prompt: Suggest 10 blog post ideas related to [topic] that align with recent trends in [industry].

content-creation.title: Personalized Insta Content idea
content-creation.prompt: Help me come up with ideas for insta content but before that ask me about my interests, hobbies, and what I want to achieve with my content.

content-creation.title: YouTube Video Script Generator
content-creation.description: Generate an engaging YouTube video script with proper structure
content-creation.prompt:
You are a professional YouTube content writer.
Write a highly engaging, well-structured script for a YouTube video about [topic].
The video should be [target duration in minutes] long and aimed at [target audience].
Use a friendly and conversational tone with short, punchy sentences.
Structure the script into:
1. Hook (first 10 seconds to grab attention)
2. Introduction (introduce the topic and what viewers will learn)
3. Main Content (present information in sections with examples/stories)
4. Engagement cues (ask questions, encourage likes/subs)
5. Conclusion (summarize and end with call-to-action)

content-creation.title: Blog Post Outline
content-creation.prompt: Create a detailed outline for a blog post about [topic]. Include sections for introduction, main points, examples, and conclusion.

content-creation.title: Social Media Content Schedule
content-creation.prompt: Plan a week's worth of social media content for [platform] focusing on [theme or topic]. Include post types, captions, and hashtags.

content-creation.title: Podcast Episode Ideas
content-creation.prompt: Generate 5 engaging podcast episode ideas related to [topic]. Include potential guests and key discussion points for each episode.

content-creation.title: Best way to success on YouTube
content-creation.prompt: What are the best ways to succeed on YouTube? Provide a detailed guide covering content strategy, audience engagement, and growth tactics.

content-creation.title: Storywriting With AI
content-creation.prompt: Write a short story about [theme or topic] using AI. The story should be engaging, with a clear beginning, middle, and end.

content-creation.title: Email Newsletter Content
content-creation.prompt: Draft content for an email newsletter about [topic]. Include a catchy subject line, engaging introduction, main content, and a call to action.

content-creation.title: Visual Content Ideas
content-creation.prompt: Suggest creative visual content ideas for [topic] that can be used across social media platforms. Include formats like infographics, videos, and images.

content-creation.title: Content Repurposing Strategy
content-creation.prompt: Create a strategy for repurposing existing content into different formats (e.g., turning a blog post into a video, infographic, and social media posts).

content-creation.title: Podcast Script
content-creation.prompt: Write a script for a podcast episode about [topic]. The script should include an engaging introduction, main discussion points, and a conclusion with a call to action.

content-creation.title: Creative Writing Prompt
content-creation.prompt: Write a short story or poem based on the following prompt: [insert creative prompt]. The piece should be engaging and showcase your unique writing style.

content-creation.title: Text To Image Generation Prompt
content-creation.prompt: Create a prompt for generating an image using AI tools. The prompt should specify the desired style, elements, and mood of the image.

programming-tech.title: Code Review/Analysis
Debugging Assistance
programming-tech.prompt:
Help me debug this code snippet. What could be causing the following error: [insert error message]?

```python
# Your code here
```

programming-tech.title: Data Algorithm Design
programming-tech.prompt: Design an algorithm to solve the following problem: [describe problem]. Provide a step-by-step explanation of your approach.

programming-tech.title: Data Algorithm Optimization
programming-tech.prompt:
Optimize the following algorithm for better performance. What changes would you make to improve its time complexity?

```csharp
// Your code here
```

programming-tech.title: API Integration Guide
programming-tech.prompt: Provide a step-by-step guide on how to integrate the following API into a web application: [API documentation link]. Include code examples and best practices.

programming-tech.title: Navbar Component generation
programming-tech.prompt: Generate a responsive navigation bar component using [JS/React/Next]. The navbar should include links to Home, About, Services, and Contact. Use Tailwind CSS for styling.

programming-tech.title: E-commerce website development
programming-tech.prompt: You are a top-tier web development assistant. I want you to generate **a complete production-ready e-commerce website**, in multiple steps. I will ask you to proceed step-by-step; at each stage, you generate code only for that part and wait for “GO NEXT” before moving on. Use the following file & folder structure:

programming-tech.title: JavaScript Function Optimization
Database Query Optimization
programming-tech.prompt:
Optimize the following SQL query for better performance. What changes would you make to improve its execution time?

```sql
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
```

programming-tech.title: A Modern Impressive Portfolio Website
programming-tech.prompt: Create a modern, impressive portfolio website using React and Tailwind CSS. The website should include sections for Home, About, Projects, and Contact. Use responsive design principles to ensure it looks great on all devices.

programming-tech.title: A Modern Product Landing Page development
programming-tech.prompt: Create a modern product landing page using React and Tailwind CSS. The page should include sections for Product Features, Testimonials, Pricing, and a Call to Action. Ensure the design is visually appealing and responsive.

programming-tech.title: A Industry level Todo App development
programming-tech.prompt: Create a fully functional, industry-level Todo App using React and Tailwind CSS. The app should include features like user authentication, task management, and responsive design. Ensure the code is clean and follows best practices.

programming-tech.title: A Industry level Password Manager development
programming-tech.prompt:
You are a Flutter mobile security architect.
Build a production-quality password manager app in Flutter with the following requirements:

1. Encryption: Use AES-256-GCM for all vault data.
2. Key Derivation: Use Argon2id (preferred) with PBKDF2-SHA256 as fallback.
3. Secure Storage: Store keys in Flutter Secure Storage (iOS Keychain, Android Keystore).
4. Biometric Support: Use local_auth for biometric unlock, wrapping keys securely.
5. Data Storage: Use encrypted local DB (Hive AES or SQLCipher).
6. Obfuscation: Enable Flutter obfuscation in release builds.
7. Secure Communication: Enforce HTTPS, optional certificate pinning if network sync is enabled.
8. Testing: Include one unit test for encryption and one widget test for login screen.
9. Documentation: Provide a brief README explaining master password flow and storage architecture.
10. Deliverables: Minimal working code snippets and a clear project structure outline.

education-learning.title: Concept Simplifier & Analogy Generator
education-learning.prompt: Explain the complex concept of [complex scientific or academic concept, e.g., quantum entanglement, photosynthesis] in simple terms, as if explaining it to a [target audience, e.g., a 10-year-old, a high school student]. Use at least two clear analogies or real-world examples to aid understanding.

education-learning.title: Dynamic Lesson Plan Creator
education-learning.prompt: Develop a comprehensive and engaging lesson plan for a [grade level] class on the topic of [specific topic]. The plan should include learning objectives, a list of materials, an introductory 'hook' activity, step-by-step instructional procedures, a guided practice exercise, and a method for assessment for a [duration, e.g., 45-minute] period.

education-learning.title: Custom Quiz & Test Builder
education-learning.prompt: Generate a quiz with [number] questions to assess understanding of [subject or book chapter]. The quiz should include a mix of question types: [e.g., 5 multiple-choice, 3 short-answer, and 2 true/false]. Provide a separate answer key for all questions.

education-learning.title: Socratic Dialogue Prompter
education-learning.prompt: Act as a Socratic tutor. I want to deepen my understanding of [topic or text, e.g., Plato's Allegory of the Cave]. Ask me a series of probing questions to challenge my assumptions, explore underlying concepts, and guide me to a more robust understanding without giving me the direct answers.

education-learning.title: Personalized Learning Path Designer
education-learning.prompt: Create a personalized learning path for a student who wants to learn [skill or subject, e.g., Python programming]. The student's current level is [beginner/intermediate] and their goal is to [specific goal, e.g., build a simple web app]. Outline key topics, suggest resources (online courses, books, projects), and provide a week-by-week study schedule for [duration, e.g., 8 weeks].

education-learning.title: Historical Event Analyst
education-learning.prompt: Provide a detailed analysis of the historical event [name of event, e.g., the fall of the Berlin Wall]. Include the key players involved, the primary causes, the major consequences, and its long-term significance.

education-learning.title: Literary Analysis Guide
education-learning.prompt: Analyze the main themes of the novel [novel title] by [author]. Discuss how the author uses literary devices such as [e.g., symbolism, foreshadowing, irony] to develop these themes, providing specific examples from the text.

education-learning.title: Scientific Experiment Designer
education-learning.prompt: Design a simple, safe scientific experiment to demonstrate the principle of [scientific principle, e.g., osmosis, gravity, chemical reactions]. List the materials needed, provide step-by-step instructions, and explain the expected outcome and the science behind it.

education-learning.title: Debate Topic Pro-Con Generator
education-learning.prompt: For the debate topic '[debate topic, e.g., Should school uniforms be mandatory?]', generate three well-reasoned arguments for the 'pro' side and three well-reasoned arguments for the 'con' side. Support each argument with a piece of evidence or a logical reason.

education-learning.title: Language Learning Scenario
education-learning.prompt: Create a realistic dialogue scenario for a [language] learner at the [proficiency level, e.g., beginner, intermediate] level. The scenario should be [situation, e.g., ordering food at a restaurant, asking for directions, making a new friend]. Include both sides of the conversation with a translation in English.

image-generation.title: Formal Man Image generation
image-generation.prompt: PROMOTSTYLISH EDITORIAL PORTRAIT OF A CONFIDENT INDIAN MAN SEATED ON A BOLD RED CHAIR, DRESSED IN A BROWN CHECKERED BLAZER, WHITE SHIRT, TAILORED TROUSERS, AND WHITE NIKE AIR FORCE 1S. SET AGAINST A MINIMALIST BROWN BACKDROP WITH SUBTLE HS TYPOGRAPHY, THE SCENE EXUDES MODERN ELEGANCE AND HIGH-FASHION SOPHISTICATION

image-generation.title: Stylish & Confident Young Man
image-generation.prompt: A CONFIDENT, ATTRACTIVE YOUNG MAN (SAME PERSON IN IMAGE) WITH A WELL-GROOMED BEARD AND TOUSLED HAIR, POSING THOUGHTFULLY WITH HIS HAND ON HIS CHIN. HE WEARS A FITTED BLACK T-SHIRT THAT ACCENTUATES HIS MUSCULAR ARMS. TATTOOS ARE VISIBLE ON BOTH UPPER ARMS. THE PORTRAIT IS CAPTURED IN BLACK AND WHITE WITH SOFT LIGHTING, CREATING A CLASSIC, STYLISH, AND SLIGHTLY DRAMATIC STUDIO LOOK.

image-generation.title: Stylish
image-generation.prompt: Create a cinematic, fashion-style portrait of the same person in the reference image, shot from a low angle as if looking up at them. The person stands confidently among tall blooming yellow and pink wildflowers, wearing a fluffy lavender teddy coat. The background is a clear, soft blue sky with no clouds. The image should have a dreamy, film-like quality with shallow depth of field - flowers in the foreground are artistically blurred. The lighting is natural and soft, evoking a calm spring afternoon. The person has a composed and slightly serious expression, with neat Undercut with volume hair. The aesthetic should be modern editorial with a warm, nostalgic tone.

data-analysis.title: Summarize Dataset Insights
data-analysis.prompt: Analyze the dataset and provide a high-level summary including trends, patterns, and anomalies.

data-analysis.title: Correlation Analysis
data-analysis.prompt: Identify and explain the correlations between numerical variables in the dataset, highlighting the strongest relationships.

data-analysis.title: Missing Data Report
data-analysis.prompt: Analyze the dataset and return a detailed report of missing values, including percentage of missing data per column.

data-analysis.title: Outlier Detection
data-analysis.prompt: Detect and list any outliers in the dataset using statistical methods such as IQR or Z-score.

data-analysis.title: Trend Forecasting
data-analysis.prompt: Analyze the time-series data and forecast future values using an appropriate predictive model.

data-analysis.title: Cluster Analysis
data-analysis.prompt: Group the data into clusters based on similarities and provide insights about each cluster.

data-analysis.title: Data Distribution Overview
data-analysis.prompt: Provide a detailed breakdown of the distribution of values for each column, including histograms and summary statistics.
